storyInfo: Malkiewicz hears from McKee about 'Area 0,' and is greatly shaken. Meanwhile, in a match about to start, Brassrust Knight seems to have an axe to grind with an Infected competitor.

attributes.content: A moment please, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Ah, Mr. McKee. Do... do you need me for something?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's good to see you again. Have you gotten the letter from the Chamber?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The only spokesmen on competition duty for the duration of the Major will be us two... an arduous task, but a gallery of eyes will be trained on us.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: If you want to continue your ascent up the ladder after you drop the 'spokesman' title, this is your greatest chance.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Haha... even if you're joking, I'm not really into the attention. I'd rather go off and handle arena event planning and stuff...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Is that your particular expertise?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It's not exactly expertise or inability or whatever, I'm just...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're being modest again. You've adapted much faster than any of the more senior personnel.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: â€”But I have something else I needed to tell you first. I need you to know in advance.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Let's find a lounge to talk in?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Yes, you're the boss...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: What is it that needs such secrecy??
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I... shouldn't actually be telling you this, but Mr. Czarny left quite hastily.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: On each Major occasion, Kawalerielki picks three of the cities with the most rapidly developing economies to merge into the Grand Knight Territory you see now.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Within the few months following each Major, non-Grand Knight Territory cities aside, the nomadic cities return within their own one-month span to their original routes, following the route engineers' plans.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Each merging of the four cities is glorious. Marvelous flows of people, seamless trade relations, as well as the chance... to deal with a few problems.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: To be honest, if it weren't for how excessively enormous the Kawalerielki Alliance is in scale, how unable it is to effectively move and avoid Catastrophes, and how difficult it is to handle supply distribution and mining...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'd hope to never see the disbanding of the Kawalerielki Alliance.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But what I'm going to tell you today is about... mm... an unspoken rule.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Regarding...?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...The Infected.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: This year, Mieszko Industrial Group has provided the Grand Knight Territory seven nomadic platforms, to rival other countries' whole cities in scale... of course, this is how it appears on the surface.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I heard about this from my colleagues.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The main thing we should focus on right now is Area 0. It shows up nowhere on the legal listing Mieszko Industries has given.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It is a unique plateâ€”a small-scale nomadic platform, currently linked at the southwest corner, outside Plate #17.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: That's where...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes. It's right next to the Infected shelter and treatment center.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Do pardon me, Mr. Malkiewicz, but every word we're about to exchange must be on video record.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: This is by regulation. No spokesperson is permitted to act in any way which would betray the General Chamber.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You look pained. I understand. When I first heard of it, I felt much the same as you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It's just, this is too cruel...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You are now an executor of the Board of Directors, a spokesman of the General Chamber of Commerce, Malkiewicz, my good man.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: That's a reminder, nothing more. Of course it's not an admonishment or a threatâ€”haha, Mr. Czarny always did carry that air, didn't he?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Get a grasp of it all. Know what he's told you. Do as he said.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I don't mean it that way, Malkiewicz. We have to help each other.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You need to chew thoroughly over what I've told you. I'm off to check on a few Knightclubs.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Be seeing you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: ...MÅ‚ynar?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Are you there? Mâ€”
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Aunt Zofia?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oh... Margaret. Why are you still at home?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Didn't Maria say you were going to the Knights Association? That girl...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's rote procedure. It won't take much effort.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Heheh. You really have changed.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Is it thanks to that 'Rhodes Island' place? You never were any good with the paperwork side of things before.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Do you still remember when you'd just applied to become a knight? Independent knight Margaret Nearl, always getting her documents and processes mixed up...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yes. I'm lucky I had you then, Auntie.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I understand it with Maria at least, but aren't you the same age as me?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I spent so much energy getting you to call me by name. We're apart a few years and now that's undone?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We can't have gotten strange from each other, can we? Hm?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Heheh, don't worry, Zofia. It's just been a long while since I've talked with family like this, face to face.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Were you here looking for Uncle?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yes. Is he still at work?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Still not home anyway.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You know, MÅ‚ynar...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'll be civil with him, and I won't blame him either.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So don't worry.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oh... the match's about to start.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Same as it ever was. Turnout's ridiculous.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That Bladehelm Knightclub sap there, didn't he show up last year too?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Here, forget him, even their Left-hand Knight fell to Maria. What's the Bladehelm Knightclub got?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ugh... it was just luck, all luck. It's always embarrassing when they blow things out of proportion.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh. Seems like 'Brassrust' Olmer Ingra's in this match tonight too...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ha, well-acquainted, aren't you, Mariaâ€”
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: â€”Learn to shut your mouth.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: It's alright, Master Kowal.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I've already given up on becoming a competition knight. It just doesn't suit me.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's what I'm saying! You've got a wide world of options open to youâ€”no need to choose this or that! That's a bit of old-timer advice there!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Besides, you've made a mighty fine showing already! Cheers to you!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Speaking of, we still haven't done final testing on Margaret's armor, have we?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Her last suit had some decent work on it, but it still doesn't fit a Kuranta as big and brave as Margaret.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ah... I already started on adjustments myself. I'll need a bit more time.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And there's her weapon...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: When Margaret was new to the knight competitions, she used a warhammer. After that, she switched to a knight's longsword. Halos shone at her blade's edge.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Nowâ€”she's on a swordspear.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hah! It's a Minoan beauty forged of D32 Steel. The ultimate in Originium Arts conductivity!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Really takes me back. She came knocking, asking if I could change her sword out for an easier one to handleâ€”the very first time Old Nearl's granddaughter ever asked a word of meâ€”
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Enough nostalgia, Kowal, the Radiant Knight's down in the arena next week. Are you people even helping her?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Repeat that? You think I'm anything like you? Nothing but drink and idle hands all day?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: (Brassrust Knight's lined up for... capture the flag? Why's Bloodboil Knightclub squandered an elite knight on such a high-risk low-reward format...)
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (His opponent is... Oh, they're all small-time Knightclubs...)
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: (...Hold on, there's an Infected knight in this...)
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The main Major matches. Mm-hm.
When you became an Infected, did you ever picture a day like this?
Ever picture being in this arena, winning yourself more wealth than nine lives could make?
I know... I know.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: It's been my honor to join Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, Wild Mane.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah, just call me by my name.
Fine! Once I get that prize money, I'll take you for drinks, Iwona.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Deal! No one ever drinks with me except Ashlock. Here I was getting bored out of my skullâ€”
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: â€”Do you still remember the rules of capture the flag?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I do. Stay inside the score lines and avoid direct clashesâ€”
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hey, that's all the boilerplate Sona teaches youâ€”if you ask me, you smash those noble knights' armor to pieces, you're the champion.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Anyone makes for your points, you sort them out. Easy as easy comes, yeah?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ha, hahaha... if I can do it, yeah.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Have a little confidence. You don't sound off proper, they won't give you any respect.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If you want others looking up at you, it's simple as dumping them on the ground, right?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But signs say someone's out for you, hah. Didn't Ashlock beat him bad enough?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Olmer Ingra... is he only here to knock Infected heads?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: He sure has a narrow mind.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Kid nobles, pteh.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Looks like the Ashlock thing hurt his self-esteem some. Puffed up bags of hot air don't even deserve to stand in the arena.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ughâ€”man, I'm scrapping. Maybe I should find a chance to beat him up in private.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Nowâ€”will the knights please enter the arenaâ€”
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Gettem.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The kids are still waiting for us to get back.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...Gahah. Pinus Sylvestris...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: The Infected, a living scourge... dares to call itselves knights?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: To Hell with you!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight
